Articles.Content:
Hello! My name is Galih, I am from Indonesia (haven't heard an indonesian talk english before?) Soo..... yeeeeah.

Just some history of how I got KSP:

I got the demo (13.something) and played it for 2-ish months.

Then, I got the full version, which is .16 at that time. Played it for about... 2 hours. (LLLLAAAAGGGGG)

Got a new PC.

Got .23 and LOVED IT.

Edited April 17, 2014 by GalihDz
Added some history

Hi, welcome aboard.

I'm sure your english is above average (being a not native english speaker myself).
Welcome to the Forums, and I'm sure your English is no worse than anyone else around here. You'll fit right in!

You're not wrong about the lag issues KSP had in the past. I run it on a laptop perfectly now. Ahh progress.

Edit. Oh and welcome to the madhouse. May all your splosions be more spectacular than the last.

Edited April 20, 2014 by madmat
Forgot to welcome
Hi and welcome to the forums.

Hi and welcome to the forum. Don't feel overwhelmed. I was once a Curious George myself. (Seems like such a long time ago. Ah the memories). But with patience and hard work, they may someday promote you to Bottle Rocketeer, like me!
